original_text: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision nor uncircumcision counts for anything, but only faith working through love.
korean_text: 그리스도 예수 안에서는 할례나 무할례나 효력이 없으되 사랑으로써 역사하는 믿음뿐이니라

sentences.original_text: neither circumcision nor uncircumcision counts for anything,
but only faith working through love.
